name: ZEPNUM Injection
description: Meropenem Injection IP (1gm). Used for I.V. use only.

name: ZEPNUM-S Injection
description: Meropenem & Sulbactam Sodium (1.5 gm) for Injection. Used for I.V. use only.

name: ZOXILIN™ Injection
description: Doxycycline (100 mg, per vial) for Injection. Lyophilized powder for I.V. use only.

name: ZONPRA™ Injection
description: Pantoprazole (40 mg) for Injection. Lyophilized powder for I.V. use only.

name: ZEFOZON™ Injection
description: Cefoperazone Injection IP (1000 mg). Used for IV/IM use.

name: ZEFOZON-S™ Injection
description: Cefoperazone & Sulbactam Sodium (1500 mg) for Injection. Used for IV/IM use only.
